attributes.action: Make Manchester Victoria A Better Station
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: make manchester victoria a better station with cafes and more seats to seat down the station is so outdated that it needs to more like piccadily in manchester and more palforms 6 isnt good and the people who past thought thinks something needs to do please sign this and help make it happen

rejection.details: The Government announced earlier this month that  funding will be provided to improve this station as well as nine others listed as the country's worst in a report by the Government's Station Champions: http://nds.coi.gov.uk/clientmicrosite/Content/Detail.aspx?ClientId=202&NewsAreaId=2&ReleaseID=408634&SubjectId=36
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
